data.message:
How many other President Trump Supporters are here?! Don't forget "President" because he's our President whether you say he's "not". 
Trump 2020!

Wow Dawn Cook that pretty smart. Except for two facts. One, he has not been charged with anything impeachable and is not being impeached. Two, even if he does get impeached, it does not mean he leaves office. Just a little history on impeachment for you, Bill Clinton, you know Hillary's husband, was actually impeached! Yet he remained president. Sometimes it is wise to say nothing and let people think you are a fool, instead of saying something and proving you're a fool!
